name: ne_neg_of_mem_sphere
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_3
inst✝³ : NormedField 𝕜
inst✝² : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
inst✝ : CharZero 𝕜
r : Real
hr : Ne r 0
x : ↑(Metric.sphere 0 r)
⊢ Ne x (Neg.neg x)
decl:
include 𝕜 in
theorem ne_neg_of_mem_sphere {r : ℝ} (hr : r ≠ 0) (x : sphere (0 : E) r) : x ≠ -x := fun h =>
  ne_zero_of_mem_sphere hr x ((self_eq_neg 𝕜 _).mp (by (conv_lhs => rw [h]); rfl))

name: ne_neg_of_mem_unit_sphere
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_3
inst✝³ : NormedField 𝕜
inst✝² : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
inst✝ : CharZero 𝕜
x : ↑(Metric.sphere 0 1)
⊢ Ne x (Neg.neg x)
decl:
include 𝕜 in
theorem ne_neg_of_mem_unit_sphere (x : sphere (0 : E) 1) : x ≠ -x :=
  ne_neg_of_mem_sphere 𝕜 one_ne_zero x
